title: We Love Pets!*, Highly-Efficient Central A/C, Ceiling fans
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 48', 'OR Text', '48', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 793 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Meet Monaco Park, a modernized apartment community where luxury is felt.', 'We may not be stretched along the coastline of the Mediterranean Sea, but we have our own little slice of the French Riviera on West Desert Inn in Spring Valley, Las Vegas.', 'With two resort-styled pools, gated access, and options for private detached garages – we’ve carefully designed this living experience for the sophisticated.', 'Features:', 'Designer Lighting Package*, Homes WiFi ready with pre-installed modem and 1st month free, provided by Cox., Expansive Pantry Space, Double-Paned Windows, Premium Flooring*, Gas Fireplaces, Full-Sized Washers and Dryers, Designer Plumbing Package*, Intrusion Alarms, Ceiling fans, Highly-Efficient Central A/C, Spacious Floor Plans, Whirlpool Appliances', '*Restrictions and additional fees may apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities:', 'Covered Parking, 24-Hour Game Room, Gas Grilling Stations, 24-Hour State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, Two Resort-Style Pools with Sundecks, Minutes from Downtown, Shopping Centers and Entertainment, Business Center with Conference Room, We Love Pets!*, Individual Private Garages*, Gated Community with Controlled Access, Amazon Hub Lockers', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'fEqlIg8Sz5f']
